org.dspace.app.dav

Class DAVStatusException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.dspace.app.dav.DAVStatusException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DAVStatusException
extends Exception
    Encapsulate the components of an HTTP status response, namely an integer code and a text message. This lets a method pass a complete HTTP status up its chain of callers via the exception mechanism.
    Author:
    Larry Stone
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
